verses.verse: <S%G2532>It<s%> <S%G1722>happened,<s%> when <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2064>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G5100>one<s%> of the <S%G758>rulers<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> on a <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%> to <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> <S%G2532>that<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G3906>watching<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> they were <S%G2270>silent.<s%> <S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G1949>took<s%> <S%G2390>him,<s%> and healed <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> let him <S%G630>go.<s%>

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G4314><s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5101>"Which<s%> of <S%G5216>you,<s%> if <S%G1706>your<s%> <S%G3688>son<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> an <S%G1016>ox<s%> <S%G1706>fell<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G5421>well,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756>wouldn't<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G385>pull<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G385>out<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> a <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%> <S%G2250>day?<s%>"

<S%G1161>He<s%> <S%G3004>spoke<s%> a <S%G3850>parable<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> those <S%G3588>who<s%> were <S%G2564>invited,<s%> when he <S%G1907>noticed<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> they <S%G1586>chose<s%> the best <S%G4411>seats,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%>

<S%G3752>"When<s%> you are <S%G2564>invited<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> a <S%G1062>marriage<s%> <S%G3361>feast,<s%> don't <S%G2625>sit<s%> <S%G2625><s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the best <S%G4411>seat,<s%> since <S%G3379>perhaps<s%> someone more <S%G1784>honorable<s%> than <S%G4675>you<s%> might <S%G5600>be<s%> <S%G2564>invited<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%>

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> you are <S%G2564>invited,<s%> <S%G4198>go<s%> and <S%G377>sit<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G2078>lowest<s%> <S%G5117>place,<s%> so <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> he who <S%G2564>invited<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> <S%G2064>comes,<s%> he may <S%G2036>tell<s%> <S%G4671>you,<s%> <S%G5384><s%> 'Friend, move <S%G4320>up<s%> <S%G511>higher.<s%>' <S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G4671>you<s%> <S%G2071>will<s%> be <S%G1391>honored<s%> in the <S%G1799>presence<s%> of all <S%G3588>who<s%> sit at the table <S%G4873>with<s%> <S%G4671>you.<s%>

<S%G3754>For<s%> <S%G3956>everyone<s%> who <S%G5312>exalts<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> will be <S%G5013>humbled,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>whoever<s%> <S%G5013>humbles<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> will be <S%G5312>exalted.<s%>"

<S%G1161>He<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to the one <S%G3588>who<s%> had invited <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3752>"When<s%> you <S%G4160>make<s%> a <S%G712>dinner<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> a <S%G1173>supper,<s%> <S%G3361>don't<s%> <S%G5455>call<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G5384>friends,<s%> <S%G3366>nor<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G3366>nor<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G4773>kinsmen,<s%> <S%G3366>nor<s%> <S%G4145>rich<s%> <S%G1069>neighbors,<s%> or <S%G3379>perhaps<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> might <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G479>return<s%> <S%G4571>the<s%> <S%G479>favor,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G468>pay<s%> <S%G4671>you<s%> <S%G1096>back.<s%>
<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> you <S%G4160>make<s%> a <S%G1403>feast,<s%> <S%G2564>ask<s%> the <S%G4434>poor,<s%> the <S%G376>maimed,<s%> the <S%G5560>lame,<s%> or the <S%G5185>blind;<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4671>you<s%> will <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G3107>blessed,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> the resources to <S%G467>repay<s%> <S%G4671>you.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> you will be <S%G467>repaid<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of the <S%G1342>righteous.<s%>"

<S%G1161>When<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> of those <S%G3588>who<s%> sat at the table with <S%G4873>him<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> these <S%G5023>things,<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3107>"Blessed<s%> is he <S%G3739>who<s%> will <S%G5315>feast<s%> <S%G740><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G932>Kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God!<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G2087>"Another<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G59><s%> 'I have bought <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G2201>yoke<s%> of <S%G1016>oxen,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I must <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G1381>try<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2065>out.<s%> Please <S%G4571><s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G3868>excused.<s%>'

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G1565>"That<s%> <S%G1401>servant<s%> <S%G3854>came,<s%> and <S%G518>told<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2962>lord<s%> these <S%G5023>things.<s%> <S%G5119>Then<s%> the master of the <S%G3617>house,<s%> being <S%G3710>angry,<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1401>servant,<s%> <S%G1831><s%> 'Go out <S%G5030>quickly<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4113>streets<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4505>lanes<s%> of the <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5602>bring<s%> <S%G1521>in<s%> the <S%G4434>poor,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G376>maimed,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5185>blind,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5560>lame.<s%>'

<S%G2532>"The<s%> <S%G1401>servant<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2962><s%> 'Lord, it is <S%G1096>done<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> you <S%G2004>commanded,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> there <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2089>still<s%> <S%G5117>room.<s%>'

<S%G1063>For<s%> I <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> of <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> were <S%G2564>invited<s%> will <S%G1089>taste<s%> of <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G1173>supper.<s%>'"

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> were <S%G4848>going<s%> <S%G4848>with<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%> <S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G4762>turned<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%>

<S%G1487>"If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3165>me,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>doesn't<s%> <S%G3404>disregard<s%> <S%G1438>his<s%> own <S%G3962>father,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3384>mother,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1135>wife,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5043>children,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G79>sisters,<s%> <S%G2089>yes,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> his <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G5590>life<s%> <S%G3756>also,<s%> he <S%G1410>can't<s%> <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3101>disciple.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3748>Whoever<s%> <S%G941><s%> <S%G3756>doesn't<s%> <S%G941>bear<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> own <S%G4716>cross,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> <S%G3756>me,<s%> <S%G1410>can't<s%> <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3101>disciple.<s%>

<S%G3379>Or<s%> <S%G2443>perhaps,<s%> when <S%G846>he<s%> has <S%G5087>laid<s%> a <S%G2310>foundation,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2480>is<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2480>able<s%> to <S%G1615>finish,<s%> <S%G3956>everyone<s%> who <S%G2334>sees<s%> <S%G756>begins<s%> to <S%G1702>mock<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%>
<S%G3754>saying,<s%> <S%G3778><s%> 'This <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G3618>build,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2480><s%> <S%G3756>wasn't<s%> <S%G2480>able<s%> to <S%G1615>finish.<s%>'

<S%G2228>Or<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G935>king,<s%> as he <S%G4198>goes<s%> to <S%G4820>encounter<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G4171>war,<s%> will <S%G3780>not<s%> <S%G2523>sit<s%> <S%G2523>down<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> and <S%G1011>consider<s%> <S%G1487>whether<s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1415>able<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G5505>thousand<s%> to meet <S%G528>him<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1501>twenty<s%> <S%G5505>thousand?<s%>

<S%G1161>Or<s%> <S%G3361>else,<s%> while the <S%G846>other<s%> <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> a great way <S%G4206>off,<s%> he <S%G649>sends<s%> an <S%G4242>envoy,<s%> and asks for <S%G2065>conditions<s%> <S%G4314>of<s%> <S%G1515>peace.<s%>

<S%G3767>So<s%> <S%G3779>therefore<s%> whoever <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G3756>doesn't<s%> <S%G657>renounce<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> he <S%G3756>has,<s%> he <S%G1410>can't<s%> <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3101>disciple.<s%>
<S%G217>Salt<s%> is <S%G2570>good,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> the <S%G217>salt<s%> becomes flat and <S%G3471>tasteless,<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> do you season <S%G741>it?<s%>
